topic.title: ZeroNet Forums Help - How to make a topic sticky?
topic.body: On this site, the top topic "Test messages" is stickied. How do I do this to my own topic on my own site?

1_14Fk98LFCxHGnzEQDG3KiWqvYehNw6UaN2.body:
> [nofish](#comment_538_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): in content.json there is settings part, you can put your topic id there (found in the url)

Thanks, that helped; but how can I do it via the web interface?
